src:
トヨタ、売上高と最終利益とも過去最高…９月中間決算

07 Nov 2019, 15:15

　トヨタ自動車が７日発表した２０１９年９月中間連結決算（米国会計基準）は、売上高が前年同期比４・２％増の１５兆２８５５億円、最終利益が２・６％増の１兆２７４９億円と増収増益だった。売上高と最終利益は中間決算としては過去最高を更新した。昨年から相次いで投入した新型車の販売が各国で好調だったことなどが奏功した。
　本業のもうけを示す営業利益は、１１・３％増の１兆４０４３億円。ダイハツ工業と日野自動車を含むグループ全体の販売台数は、国内を中心に、北米や欧州など多くの地域で伸び、前年同期より１６万１０００台多い、５４５万４０００台だった。
　主力の北米での営業利益が前年同期より増加した。スポーツ用多目的車（ＳＵＶ）「ＲＡＶ４」や「カローラ」などの新型車の販売が好調だった。値引きの原資として販売会社に支払う販売奨励金を抑えられたことも、利益増につながった。
　河合満副社長は記者会見で「継続的に体質強化に取り組んできた成果が、少しは表れた」と評価した。
text:
Toyota, record sales and final profit both record high ... September interim results

07 Nov 2019, 15:15

The consolidated financial results for September 2019 announced by Toyota Motor on September 7 (US GAAP) show that net sales increased by 4.2% year-on-year to ¥ 15,285.5 billion, and net income increased by 2.6% to 1 trillion Sales and profit increased to 274.9 billion yen. Sales and net income reached record highs as interim results. The success of the sales of new models launched one year since last year was successful.
】 Operating profit, which shows profits from the main business, increased by 11.3% to ¥ 1,0404.3 billion. Sales of the entire group, including Daihatsu Motor and Hino Motors, grew in many regions such as North America and Europe, mainly in Japan, and reached 5454,000, an increase of 161,000 from the same period of the previous year.
主 Operating profit in the mainstay North America increased from the same period of the previous year. Sales of new models such as the sports multipurpose vehicle (SUV) "RAV4" and "Corolla" were strong. Profits also increased due to a reduction in sales incentives paid to sales companies as a source of discounts.
Vice President Mitsuru Kawai evaluated at the press conference that "the results of continuous efforts to strengthen the structure have appeared a little."
